page.title: 14LIFESTYLES
page.content:
A GREENGROCERS BOY.
My Dad owns the Greengrocer's shop on the Bishopsworth Road. He gets up at 7 a.m. and goes to Bristol fruit and vegetable market every day to get fresh fruit and vegetables. I go to the shop every Saturday morning and Monday after school to help. I do not live at the shop, I live at 67 Brooklyn Road. The stuff we sell varies with the time of year but some things like apples sell all year. We have a well in front of the shop which is also the high point on Bedminster Down.
BEDMINSTER DOWN JUNIOR SCHOOL.
